Segment.name: BQT
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of a Request for Quotation Transaction Set and transmit identifying numbers and dates

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: RequestForQuoteReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the purchaser to identify his request for quote

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PurchaseOrderTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of Purchase Order

Field.name: RequestForQuoteTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of request for quote

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: PurchaseCategory
Field.comment: Code identifying the broad category of products or services being acquired

Field.name: ChangeOrderSequenceNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the orderer identifying a specific change or revision to a previously transmitted transaction set
